alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Grant; Juneau; Richland; Vernon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 7:52PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Clayton, eastern Allamakee, southeastern Houston, southwestern Juneau, Vernon, Grant, Richland and Crawford Counties through 845 PM CST... At 752 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near New Albin to Harpers Ferry to near Guttenberg. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bloomington around 800 PM CST. Lancaster around 810 PM CST. Viroqua, Boscobel and Westby around 815 PM CST. Platteville around 825 PM CST. La Farge around 830 PM CST. Muscoda around 835 PM CST. Hillsboro around 845 PM CST. Other locations impacted by these storms include Eastman, County 5 And Peyton Road, Chaseburg, Turkey River, Gillingham, Neptune, County Roads A And Z, Fargo, Gays Mills and Ash Ridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
